description: Contains users waiting to be notified about an order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RECIPIENT_USER_ID
columns.description: EMP ID of a user waiting to be notified about the order.

columns.name: REQ_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the user started waiting to be notified.
